content:
Not much to discuss today, I think.

For the release itself:

  • @tmandry has started crater triage (not sure if done yet)
  • release notes are in good shape, I likely will r+ the initial PR later today and then we can iterate in new PRs as needed.
Still working on crater, probably most of the issues are filed now but I still need to go through the long tail of results
I will note that the new crater capacity seems to be online and doing well, so beta runs are now down to ~2-3 days
I'm not sure there's much else to bring up -- @triagebot end-meeting ?

Does anyone have something to bring up?
React with :working_on_it: if you have something to say.
React with :all_good: if you're ready to end the meeting.

ok, great, short meeting today but seems good :)

Thanks everyone!
